changelog:
"feat: Add custom category management functionality
? Create, edit and delete custom categories
? Color picker with 15 predefined colors for personalization
? Protected predefined categories from deletion
? Separate display of standard and custom categories
? Navigation integration from Settings screen
? Full German and English localization

fix: Resolve compiler errors in CategoryManagementScreen
? Fix exhaustive when expression with UiState.Empty case
? Fix smart cast issues with delegated properties

perf: Improved category handling and database operations
? Efficient category CRUD operations
? Optimized UI state management"
